channel.title: Shop error? Won't show?
channel.description:
On the server that I am using atm, its an updated version of allstar scape, but anyway, i cant add any npc which you can talk to or shop, I have tried everything... nothing works, ill tell you what i have done:
In autospawn.cfg I added: [code] spawn = 2821 2613 3095 0 0 0 0 0 0 Farming Seller[/code]
In client.java I added: Undernieth "case 155: // first Click npc"
[code] } else if (NPCID == 2821) { //Farming seller PutNPCCoords = true; WanneShop = 99;[/code]
In shops.cfg I added: [code] shop = 99 Farming Shop 1 1 5340 1000 5312 1000 5314 1000 [/code] Now it wont show the shop... when i talk with the guy Could it because shop 99 is to high? is there a limit or something?

item.title: Shop error? Won't show?
item.dc:creator: @johnronder johnronder
item.description:
@johnronder wrote:

Well i tried changing the shop from 99 to 20, (rmoving the previous shop 20 just for testing)
and it still didnt work :((((((([br][br][size=1]Posted on: July 24, 2009, 08:03:20 am[/size][hr]i removed all shops untill shop 60, still isnt working[br][br][size=1]Posted on: July 24, 2009, 08:40:26 am[/size][hr]removed all shops till 60 , didnt work :([br][br][size=1]Posted on: July 25, 2009, 04:40:49 am[/size][hr]i tried everthing, sorry for all this spam, but its urgent

Read full topic

item.title: Shop error? Won't show?
item.dc:creator: @dillingo dillingo
item.description:
@dillingo wrote:

xpressmusic:

I think there is limit whise guy, this is delta based? As i see its delta based so make 60 max.

Considering that he probably went in order (1-98) in shops. Why would it just stop at 98?

item.title: Shop error? Won't show?
item.dc:creator: @johnronder johnronder
item.description:
@johnronder wrote:

On the server that I am using atm, its an updated version of allstar scape, but anyway, i cant add any npc which you can talk to or shop, I have tried everything… nothing works, ill tell you what i have done:

In autospawn.cfg I added:

spawn = 2821 2613 3095 0 0 0 0 0 0 Farming Seller

In client.java I added:
Undernieth “case 155: // first Click npc”

} else if (NPCID == 2821) { //Farming seller PutNPCCoords = true; WanneShop = 99;

In shops.cfg I added:

shop = 99    Farming Shop        1    1    5340    1000    5312    1000    5314    1000

Now it wont show the shop… when i talk with the guy
Could it because shop 99 is to high? is there a limit or something?

Read full topic
